title: Custom Item Sets not allowing items to be added
body: I am trying to create a custom item set for Jace (not sure if champ is relevant to the situation). When I go to the item sets to make one, I can get the set saved but I cannot actually add items to the set. It will allow me to drag icons but it doesn't save the item to the set or show up in game. In game there is only a blank item set. Anyone know a solution?

replies.body: Are you able to edit changes on existing item sets? Also, are you on a Mac computer running macOS 10.12 Sierra?
I'm having the same problem and I'm on Sierra. Can remove items from existing sets but cannot add items to new or existing sets. Is there a work around?

It's a bug we're aware of on macOS Sierra that we're looking to fix. At the moment, the only workaround is to edit or create item sets on another computer that *isn't* running macOS Sierra. Since your item sets are saved on the server, you should see those changes on your Mac.
This was 4 months ago and I am still having this problem. Are there any fixes coming soon? or am I missing a fix to this?
